Sentencas: There is a growing attention to enhance the performance of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) electrodes through the incorporation of nano-catalyst materials within the electrodes' active sites.
Titulo: Efficient and controlled nano-catalyst solid-oxide fuel cell electrode infiltration with poly-norepinephrine surface modification

Sentencas: In this study, we report a technique for increased efficiency and microstructural control of the nano-catalyst infiltration process through polymerized norepinephrine (pNE) treatment.
Titulo: Efficient and controlled nano-catalyst solid-oxide fuel cell electrode infiltration with poly-norepinephrine surface modification

Sentencas: Nano-CeO2 catalysts were incorporated within both electrodes of commercial anode-supported SOFCs using a single salt solution step after a coating of pNE within the porous microstructure.
Titulo: Efficient and controlled nano-catalyst solid-oxide fuel cell electrode infiltration with poly-norepinephrine surface modification

Sentencas: The optimization of catalyst loading was performed by varying the cerium nitrate solution concentrations between 0.4 and 2.0 M. The ceria nanoparticles are distributed at the near-electrolyte region in both electrodes, but with microstructural variance due to the precursor molarity and solid loading.
Titulo: Efficient and controlled nano-catalyst solid-oxide fuel cell electrode infiltration with poly-norepinephrine surface modification

Sentencas: The time-dependent polarization resistance (R-p) variation was categorized into three zones by the nano-catalyst loading.
Titulo: Efficient and controlled nano-catalyst solid-oxide fuel cell electrode infiltration with poly-norepinephrine surface modification

Sentencas: Zone I referred to the baseline performance for the low-catalyst loading and fluctuating R-p.
Titulo: Efficient and controlled nano-catalyst solid-oxide fuel cell electrode infiltration with poly-norepinephrine surface modification

Sentencas: However, the cells in Zone II and III showed a continuous time-dependent activation as low as 0.275 Omega cm(2) at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Efficient and controlled nano-catalyst solid-oxide fuel cell electrode infiltration with poly-norepinephrine surface modification

Sentencas: The results suggest that the nano-CeO2 film reduces coarsening and related degradation of the backbone.
Titulo: Efficient and controlled nano-catalyst solid-oxide fuel cell electrode infiltration with poly-norepinephrine surface modification

Sentencas: In addition, the pNE-assisted dip infiltration enhanced infiltrant deposition efficiency by reducing the number of infiltration steps.
Titulo: Efficient and controlled nano-catalyst solid-oxide fuel cell electrode infiltration with poly-norepinephrine surface modification
